name: Krave Mart
headline: Grocery Delivery in Pakistan
description: Krave Mart is the Rappi for Pakistan. We’re an online grocery store that delivers within minutes.

founders.name: Kassim Shroff, Founder
founders.description: 2x Founder with a successful exit (Gobabu.com acquired by Buytopia.ca) and 12+ years of eCommerce experience at Daraz (Alibaba) in Pakistan

founders.name: Ch Haziq Ahmed, Founder
founders.description: An omni channel retail enthusiast building a Yellow Rocketship!!!

founders.name: Hammad Bawany, Founder
founders.description: Have 10+ years of experience in e-commerce industry. Started from Daraz.pk (Alibaba group), founded my own e-commerce company, worked as head of product and ops at HumMart - online grocery company, Foodpanda (Delivery Hero) and now founded KraveMart

founders.name: Mohammad Ahsan Kidwai, Founder
founders.description: A General Management, eCommerce, Sales and Shopper Marketing Professional, having a decade plus worth of experience with leading organizations such as Alibaba Group, Swvl, Unilever, GlaxoSmithKline & more! Having done my Masters in Innovation & Entrepreneurship from the University of Warwick and a Bachelors in Business Studies & Economics from the University of Manchester, have led teams on a country level, as well as Commercial and Trade Marketing functions in my previous roles.

generated_description:
### Krave Mart: The Grocery Revolution in Pakistan

Founded in 2021, Krave Mart is rapidly transforming the grocery landscape in Pakistan, modeling itself as the Rappi of the region. This online grocery store offers lightning-fast delivery services, getting essentials to customers’ doors in a matter of minutes—a feat that's both ambitious and necessary.

**Mission**  
Krave Mart's mission is straightforward: to simplify grocery shopping for the people of Pakistan through quick and reliable delivery.

**Location & Team**  
Headquartered in Karachi and boasting a dedicated team of 80 employees, Krave Mart is not just a startup; it’s an ambitious player in the burgeoning Pakistani e-commerce market. The company is also part of the prestigious Y Combinator Batch S22, which speaks volumes about its potential and promise.

**Service Area**  
Currently, their services extend to major cities like Karachi, Rawalpindi, and Lahore, making it convenient for a wide audience who wants groceries without the hassle of traditional shopping—queues included.

**How It Works**  
The process is simple: choose from a diverse selection of products, check out, and await your "Rockstar Rider." In mere minutes, your groceries arrive, eliminating the old-school grocery shopping headaches. This seamless model has positioned Krave Mart as a go-to solution for instant needs—think late-night snacks or just stocking up for the week.

**Customer Experience**  
Customer feedback highlights a satisfying experience with quick deliveries, fresh produce, and competitive pricing. Users rave about the app's convenience, its user-friendly features, and the low delivery charges. It’s not just about speed; it’s about efficiency and quality.

**Why It Matters**  
In a country where traditional commerce prevails, Krave Mart provides a much-needed alternative. It’s not just about groceries; it’s a shift towards embracing modern consumer habits and e-commerce resilience.

**Looking Ahead**  
With ongoing enhancements and frequent updates to their app, Krave Mart is positioning itself for continual growth. By building on customer feedback and evolving its service model, it aims to capture a more significant market share in the evolving digital landscape of Pakistan.

**Connect with Krave Mart**  
For more information, check out their website at [Krave Mart](https://www.kravemart.com). Whether you're looking for household essentials or just a craving snack, it seems Krave Mart is here to deliver—literally.
